## Assignment for "Getting and Cleaning Data"

The task was to download and clean ["Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones" data set](http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones) and output a tidy data set.

**Process followed for the cleanup

1. Fetch the file from  https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip.
2. Extract the file and move all the test and training data to root folder
3. Set the working directory to that folder
3. Execute the run_analysis.R to clean and extract required data into a tidy.txt file.
